name: Yogesh Gaikwad
desc: Meet the team lead of Mozilla club, MIT AOE. As his team describes him, he is a developer and a coder by his choice mastering the mantra of dedication and leadership. As a person, as a leader, he strongly believes "Talent wins games, but teamwork and intelligence win championships."

name: Ambuj Mishra
desc: Meet the Content team lead, Ambuj Mishra. A person who knows how to play his cards wisely. A short description for him could be technically strong, developer, coder, and a sweet poet. It is imperative to have such a talented person full of politeness and new ideas.

job: Web development lead, Mozilla club MITAOE
name: Sagar Sonawane
desc: A person with the right set of web development skills, wizard of Web development field as well as persistently building new websites, always exploring new technologies and exactly know how to turn adversity into opportunity, witty but wise

name: Gajanan Khande
desc: A person with supreme communication skills and listening ability, a strategic thinker, as well as a good influencer in and out, expert of Business marketing and, holds a solid grasp of analytics
